input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
CY Graphic Design Limited Quantity Cover Case For ZTE Source N9511 / Majesty Z796C (Include a CYstore Stylus Pen) - Seamless Antique Swirls

Item keywords:
This two pieces snap-on image with rubber coated case makes your cell phone has truly unique style
Special design provides protection from scratches
Unique design allows easy access to all buttons, controls and ports without having to remove the case
Material: Hard plastic image with thin rubber coating
With a very nice CYstore Stylus Pen
Easy to install: Just snap on.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Looking for a phone case that's both stylish and functional? Look no further than the CY Graphic Design Limited Quantity Cover Case for the ZTE Source N9511 / Majesty Z796C. This two-piece snap-on case features a hard plastic image with a thin rubber coating, providing protection from scratches and a unique style all in one. The special design allows easy access to all buttons, controls, and ports without having to remove the case, and the included CYstore Stylus Pen adds even more functionality. Plus, with a limited quantity available, this case is sure to make a statement. So why wait? Order yours today and take your cell phone style to the next level!
input_text.Response B: Introducing the CY Graphic Design Limited Quantity Cover Case for the ZTE Source N9511 / Majesty Z796C. This unique case is designed to provide protection from scratches while adding a touch of style to your device. The case is made of hard plastic with a thin rubber coating and features a seamless antique swirls design. It comes with a very nice CYstore Stylus Pen, making it a great value. The case is easy to install and provides easy access to all buttons, controls, and ports without having to remove the case. Don't miss out on this limited-quantity case, order yours today!

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
